property.name: DateField
property.description-key: Field to be mapped to custom date field

property.name: MinDate
property.description-key: Configure the minimum range for date control

property.name: MaxDate
property.description-key: Configure the maximum range for date control

property.name: EnableDefault
property.description-key: Configure the default value for date control

property.name: SetDefault
property.description-key: Configure the default value for date control or Today date
